Sentencas: Biomass discharged from primary industries can be converted into methane by fermentation.
Titulo: Density functional theory analysis for H2S adsorption on pyridinic N- and oxidized N-doped graphenes

Sentencas: This methane is used for generating electricity with solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Density functional theory analysis for H2S adsorption on pyridinic N- and oxidized N-doped graphenes

Sentencas: This methane fermentation provides H2S, which reduces the efficiency of SOFCs even at a level as low as a few parts per million.
Titulo: Density functional theory analysis for H2S adsorption on pyridinic N- and oxidized N-doped graphenes

Sentencas: It has been experimentally reported that a nitrogen (N)-doped graphene-based material known as pyridinic N removes H2S via an oxidation reaction compared with another graphene-based material known as oxidized N. To understand this experimental result, we investigated H2S adsorption on pyridinic N and oxidized N by a density functional theory analysis and further examined the activation barrier of dissociation reactions.
Titulo: Density functional theory analysis for H2S adsorption on pyridinic N- and oxidized N-doped graphenes

Sentencas: We found that the adsorption of H2S on pyridinic N is more stable than that on oxidized N.
Titulo: Density functional theory analysis for H2S adsorption on pyridinic N- and oxidized N-doped graphenes

Sentencas: In addition, the H2S dissociation reaction occurs only on pyridinic N.
Titulo: Density functional theory analysis for H2S adsorption on pyridinic N- and oxidized N-doped graphenes
